summary: Changes values of potions, poisons, scrolls, books, soulgems, dragon bones/scales and tools
descriptionHtml:
I combined several mods into one so I can override all the values in one go by putting this at the bottom of the load order since these items are a huge hassle at default values. Some of the mods only had a weightless version as far as I could find here on nexusmods, but by adding no weight to those items it kind of eliminated the trips you'd have to make to store stuff besides the items you loot from dungeons.

I take no credit for this mod, I am merely supplying an all in one solution that was intended for personal use. This changes all values of vanilla items stated below

This changes values of:
Potions & Poisons: 0,1 - ID list by JustinOther http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1036
Scrolls: 0,1 - ID list by JustinOther http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26959
Ingredients: 0,1 - ID list by jinjishu http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10460
Soulgems: 0,1 - ID list by jinjishu http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10483
Books: 0,1 - ID list by DaedricBiscuts http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26661
Dragon Bones/Scales: 1,0 (alternative: 3,0)
(Notched, Rocksplinter) Pickaxe and Woodcutting Axe: 1,0

*Note:
The item names for Soulgems and Tools are edited for easier access. These names are used from the Better Item Sorting mod entries. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14319

Optional version: Slightly increased Dragon Bones/Scales to not break the immuhsion too hard. Includes every weight edit just like the main file, just an increased weight is added to dragon items. Do not install both.
